meanings.sent1: The dog's scabbiest ear made it look uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: After falling off his bike, his knee became the scabbiest part of his body.
meanings.sent3: The scabbiest patch on the tree made it look like it had a rough day.
meanings.sent4: The scabbiest rock on the beach was a reminder of the harsh waves it endured.
meanings.sent5: The scabbiest part of the old book was where the pages were torn and worn.

meanings.definition: Of the poorest quality or lowest standard
meanings.sent1: The scabbiest pencil in the pack kept breaking while he tried to write.
meanings.sent2: The scabbiest shirt he owned had holes and faded colors.
meanings.sent3: The scabbiest toy in the box was missing pieces and looked sad.
meanings.sent4: The scabbiest car in the lot had rust and peeling paint.
meanings.sent5: The scabbiest apple in the basket was bruised and mushy.
